name: JARG
description:
This game is made for "Mouse Jam [8 Bits to Infinity]"

This game is controlled using just the mouse.

  • Right button to jump.
  • Left button to fall quickly.
  • Wheel "Spin up" to fire.
  • Wheel "Click" to speed up.

Assets used https://v3x3d.itch.io/retro-lines.

Music True 8-Bit Music | Electronic Music | Unity Asset Store
